com.mpos.lottery.te.gameimpl.magic100.sale.service

类 Magic100SaleService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.trans.domain.logic.AbstractReversalOrCancelStrategy
      • com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.sale.service.AbstractTicketService
        • com.mpos.lottery.te.gameimpl.magic100.sale.service.Magic100SaleService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    GameTypeAware, CompositeTicketService, TicketEnquiryService, TicketService, ReversalOrCancelStrategy, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class Magic100SaleService
extends AbstractTicketService
    Make a sale of magic100 game. For magic100, only single-draw sale option is supported, and only single entry can be carried in sale request. For example, below is a sale request: 
     <Ticket PIN="!!!!" multipleDraws="1" totalAmount="300.0">
    <GameDraw gameId="LK-1" number="001"/>
    <Entry betOption="1" inputChannel="0" selectedNumber="PLAY" totalBets="3"/>
 </Ticket>
    Only one single entry whose 'totalBets' is 3, in this case, the backend will generate 3 'BaseEntry' records instead. That says the 'totalBets' in sale request is telling that how many entries should be generated at the backend, and the total bets of each entry is simply 1.

      • calTax

        protected java.math.BigDecimal[] calTax(Magic100Ticket clientTicket)
                                 throws ApplicationException
        Calculate the total prize amount and tax amount of a ticket.
        参数:
        clientTicket - The magic100 ticket.
        返回:
        A array in which 1st is total prize amount and the 2nd is total tax amount.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
